author: Bushido Brown

text: I already posted the original version from ToS, but it's been 11 years (!) and I like it enough for it to deserve anotherd spot with Dawn of the New World. I liked the original game enough that I was glad to get a follow-up in the same world, revisiting the locations with a fresh coat of paint. Do you have a game in mind that you would like to revisit through a new story and characters, let's say a year after the events of the first game?
author: SupraDarky

text: I can't think of anything else I would rather revisit than Tales of Symphonia. Perhaps Mario 64 but it would work best for JRPGs.
author: TalesOfGod #
